Prev: Looking out from a charcoal kiln Up: Death Valley Next: Charcoal kiln

Snowy hills behind the charcoal kilns



There was even a little snow a few feet from the parking lot, which Timothy made a snowball from.
Taken Tuesday, March 30, 2004, 02:34:28pm.  Original image size: 3072x2048, 5.8Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/160s @ F9.0, ISO 100, 28mm/F2.8 (45mm equiv)
